title: Auto insurance ID cards (proof of insurance)
dataVerified: Policyholder name, vehicle VIN, policy number, coverage dates, insurer name
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake insurance cards at traffic stops, accidents, and vehicle registration. Domain binding verifies insurer. Real-time verification by police and DMV. Short card lifetime (6 months typical). Uninsured motorist fraud costs $14 billion annually in USA. Critical for law enforcement where insurance card fraud enables uninsured driving.
